import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import CONFIG from '../config'; export default function Dashboard(){ const [requests,setRequests]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`${CONFIG.API_BASE}/requests`).then(r=>r.json()).then(setRequests).catch(()=>{}); },[]); return (

Dashboard

{['Active Requests','Volunteers Online'].map((t,i)=>(

{t}

{t==='Active Requests'?requests.length:84}

))}

Recent Requests

    {requests.map(r=>(
  • {r.type} — {r.description?.slice(0,60)} — {r.status}
    • ))}
); }
